info.title: API Rewrite
info.summary: Référence de l'API Projets (Projets, clés API, modèles, webhooks).
info.description:
Référence publique complète des points de terminaison au niveau projet de l'API Rewrite v1.

Tous les endpoints renvoient une enveloppe cohérente (`ok`, `data` et `cursor` optionnel).
Utilisez soit un jeton Bearer (clé API) avec des scopes, soit une session cookie authentifiée.

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: Métadonnées du projet et cycle de vie.

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: Créer, lister et révoquer les clés API du projet.

tags.name: Templates
tags.description: Gérer des modèles SMS réutilisables avec variables.

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description: Enregistrer et gérer les webhooks d'événements de livraison.

patch.description: Met à jour les champs modifiables du projet comme `name`. Nécessite le scope `project:write` pour les clés API.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"Alertes marketing"}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"Alertes marketing\"}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"Alertes marketing\"}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("PATCH", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "PATCH"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"Alertes marketing\"}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PATCH 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"Alertes marketing"}'

delete.description: Supprime définitivement le projet et les ressources associées. Opération réservée au propriétaire.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'DELETE',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("DELETE", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X DELETE 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

get.description:
Renvoie les clés API actives du projet avec pagination par curseur.

Utilisez `limit`, `after` et `before` pour paginer.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'GET',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("GET", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

post.description: Crée une clé API de projet et renvoie le secret une seule fois. Stockez-le de manière sécurisée.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"Worker de taches","scopes":["project:templates:read","projects:webhooks:read"]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"Worker de taches\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"Worker de taches\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"Worker de taches\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"Worker de taches","scopes":["project:templates:read","projects:webhooks:read"]}'

delete.description: Révoque immédiatement une clé API par son identifiant.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'DELETE',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

value.name: order_shipped
value.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

post.description: Crée un modèle réutilisable avec variables et valeurs de repli.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: ID de modèle unique ou nom de modèle unique.

value.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.

patch.description: Met à jour partiellement le contenu du modèle et/ou les variables.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin

val body = "{\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("PATCH", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "PATCH"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PATCH 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

Go

x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

post.description: Crée un endpoint webhook et des abonnements aux événements.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'POST',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    },
    json={
      "name": "Événements de livraison",
      "endpoint": "https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite",
      "events": [
        "sms.queued",
        "sms.delivered",
        "sms.failed"
      ]
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"Événements de livraison","endpoint":"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite","events":["sms.queued","sms.delivered","sms.failed"]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"Événements de livraison\",\"endpoint\":\"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite\",\"events\":[\"sms.queued\",\"sms.delivered\",\"sms.failed\"]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()

var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"Événements de livraison\",\"endpoint\":\"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite\",\"events\":[\"sms.queued\",\"sms.delivered\",\"sms.failed\"]}".data(using: .utf8)

patch.description: Met à jour l'endpoint webhook, les événements, le nom ou le statut.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks/748395130237498700');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"endpoint":"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite-v2","events":["sms.delivered","sms.failed"],"status":"ACTIVE"}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks/748395130237498700')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"endpoint\":\"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite-v2\",\"events\":[\"sms.delivered\",\"sms.failed\"],\"status\":\"ACTIVE\"}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"endpoint\":\"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite-v2\",\"events\":[\"sms.delivered\",\"sms.failed\"],\"status\":\"ACTIVE\"}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks/748395130237498700")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("PATCH", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift

let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks/748395130237498700")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "PATCH"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"endpoint\":\"https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite-v2\",\"events\":[\"sms.delivered\",\"sms.failed\"],\"status\":\"ACTIVE\"}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

bearerAuth.description: Envoyez votre clé API via `Authorization: Bearer <api-key>`.

after.name: after
after.description: ID de curseur unique pour récupérer les éléments après cette valeur.

before.name: before
before.description: ID de curseur unique pour récupérer les éléments avant cette valeur.

persist.description: Indique si une autre page peut être demandée via `next`.

next.description: Curseur pour demander la page suivante (`after`).

Cursor.description: Métadonnées de curseur pour les réponses paginées.

data.description: Aucune donnée n'est renvoyée pour cette réponse.

OkEmptyResponse.description: Réponse réussie. Cet endpoint ne renvoie aucune donnée.

icon.description: Définissez `null` pour supprimer l'icône (lorsque pris en charge).

ProjectUpdateBody.description: Champs pouvant être mis à jour dans un projet.

prefix.description: Préfixe de clé publique pour l'identification.

APIKey.description: Métadonnées de clé API du projet (le secret n'est plus renvoyé ensuite).

APIKeyCreateBody.description: Crée une clé API de projet avec des scopes optionnels.

APIKeyCreateResponse.description: Réponse de création contenant la clé secrète à usage unique.

name.description: Clé de variable utilisée par votre application.

fallback.description: Valeur par défaut lorsque votre payload ne fournit pas la variable.

TemplateVariable.description: Variable nommée utilisée dans le corps d'un modèle.

Template.description: Métadonnées du modèle et instantané facultatif du contenu.

example.name: order_shipped
example.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

data.name: order_shipped
data.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

data.name: order_shipped
data.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

example.name: order_shipped
example.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

TemplateUpdateBody.description: Modifier le contenu du modèle et/ou ses variables.

example.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.

WebhookEventType.description: Types d'événements webhook pris en charge.

WebhookCreateBody.description: Créer un webhook pour recevoir les événements SMS.

WebhookUpdateBody.description: Mettre à jour l'endpoint webhook, les événements abonnés, le nom ou le statut.

AuthScope.description: Scope d'autorisation accepté par les clés API.
